page.title: 08HOUSING SURVEY
page.content: Eight of our class interviewed 3 town centre Estate Agents.The other 2 were too busy!!! -most people want to live in{E.T'mouth -average price of houses is Â£43750 -{dearest}Â£155000:{chapest}Â£15000 -wanted:view,heating,re-sellability -{new houses}:fuel-efficient, little boxes(because of high land cost), made of breeze-block, cement, tile. -{old houses}:cob, brick, slate,thatch {MY HOUSE} Lizzie:own det. house,big garden,53yr Abigail:own det. house,nice view,56yr James:own det.b'alow,big,Holcombe,56yr Georgina:own semi-det,central pos.53yr Jason:own semi-det,green garage,16yr Mark and Simon are neighbours:own 12yr terrace houses,small hillside estate. Richard:Council owned terr. house,12yr
